body: While I adore the art, this isn't hentai. Our overpowered Mc, Carol, is able to turn into a man, but never does. This was an excuse to expose breasts while telling an anime story that is, essentially, a transexuals feelings towards a girl being stronger than anything else in the world. If it was accompanied by futinari scenes wherein her love interest was giving loving blowjobs I wouldn't care, but this was just overindulgent of a story that, in the end, wasn't interesting.
